src:
James Rodriguez Masuk Radar Juventus
07 Nov 2019, 20:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Serie A, Juventus diberitakan ingin menambah kekuatan lini serang mereka. Si Nyonya Tua diberitakan ingin merekrut James Rodriguez dari Real Madrid.
Setelah dua tahun mengungsi ke Bayern Munchen, James Rodriguez akhirnya pulang ke Real Madrid. Ia tidak dipermanenkan oleh juara Bundesliga itu sehingga ia harus melanjutkan karirnya di Ibukota Spanyol.
Sempat menjadi andalan Zinedine Zidane, jam bermain James belakangan ini mulai berkurang. Alhasil ia mulai mempertimbangkan hengkang dari Santiago Bernabeu.
El Desmarque melaporkan bahwa James sudah mendapatkan tawaran dari beberapa klub top Eropa. Salah satunya adalah Juara bertahan Serie A, Juventus.

Mengapa Juventus mengincar James? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
James Rodriguez enters the Juventus Radar
Nov 7 2019, 20:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Serie A club Juventus reportedly want to add strength to their attack line. The Old Lady was reportedly wanted to recruit James Rodriguez from Real Madrid.
After two years fleeing to Bayern Munich, James Rodriguez finally returns to Real Madrid. He was not permanent by the Bundesliga champions so he had to continue his career in the Spanish capital.
Had become a mainstay of Zinedine Zidane, James's playing hours lately began to decrease. As a result he began to consider leaving the Santiago Bernabeu.
El Desmarque reports that James has received offers from several top European clubs. One of them is the defending champions of Serie A, Juventus.

Why does Juventus target James? Check out the information below.
